Description of incident: On March 23, the University confirmed              that 10,868 Social Security numbers in historical data on a computer              at Penn State Erie, The Behrend College, could have been breached.              Longstanding security measures, designed to protect the network and              systems from malicious software, alerted the University to the potential              breach. As soon as the University became aware of the malicious software              on this computer, the computer was immediately taken off line, data              was examined and information was removed.
